Articles.Content:
New part: Kringle-5000 Orbital Delivery Platform + Wintery Skids

Download:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/a-very-kerbal-christmas/

===============================

New part: The Fowl Experiment module

A new science bay for observing and testing the effects of space on a holiday feast.

It will give a small amount of science, and is available from the start - so it's a good way to gain some additional points. Try using it in the "Traditional Tech" techtree for TreeLoader!

Download:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/fowl-experiment/

=============================

The Jeb-o'-lantern: A perfect way to comfort Kerbals who are afraid of the dark.

features:

-lights up the area without the need for electrical power.

-surface-attachable

-supports career mode and KAS

Updated: Attachment and Storage in KAS work correctly, and Kerbals will now wear it as a mask when it is grabbed in EVA.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/jeb-o-lantern/

NEW! Introducing the Kerbal Maskmaker kit.

-Simplifies creating a custom mask model and placing it on your Kerbal in the right spot

-This modding kit requires the Kerbal Attachment System mod.

This kit contains the following:

- Jebmask with default Michael Myers paint - ready for use in game.

- UVmap for the jebmask so you can repaint the default mask or make other copies

- blend file with mask model and Kerbal head/helmet mockup: build a new mask around the mockup, then bring it into unity without worrying about where to place anything.

- sample cfg file.

Download the kit here:

http://www./download/ldbhnc4kcwv0kbb/Kerbal_Maskmaker_kit_with_Jebmask.zip

license: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/

new part
That is awesome!! Gonna send a shuttle to decorate my station for halloween =)
That's hilarious. I applaud you, good sir.

Great work!

Is that to protect Kerbals from looking at Kerbermans?

[]

Edited August 2, 2019 by CvVtjRtb
This is magestic!

Thanks all. Now while it is set up with the KAS modules, I wasnt able to rotate its eva position in the cfg or use the placement tool, on this or anything else since I've downloaded the latest KAS. For now, if you're having the same problems you might have to ram it or drop it on a ledge if you want a lantern sitting upright on the ground.

In order to properly light up, lanterns require oxygen. There is no oxygen in the vacuum of space.

This is great, I'm going to download it and make a few glamour shots.
You'll see why it works in space when you use it I am checking out the errors I was having with KAS, apparently I had the wrong version and module.
I was messing with the new version of the module. The part can now be stored, attached.... oh and this happened.
lol, now the space program is way more cooler with that
Cant get mine to light up, anywhere...am I missing something?

You're right, you will need to use a custom action because it doesn't use a light module, also I will be uploading a new version and it will now be a probe so you can switch to it and toggle on the light.
ERMAGHERD. Please make more holiday decorations. I want my stations to be more... FESTIVE.
Someone could make radial tanks in the form of Christmas ornaments when the time comes.
First post is updated. You can now download the Kerbal Maskmaker kit to make your own custom masks in a simple way.
Two spooky!

It's time.

To bring.

PUMPKINS TO EVERY PLANET.

Somebody who does this gets my rep.

So...... you're saying the most famous Kerbal of them all, Jeb.... is a ....monster?

People have been burnt at the stake for less, you know. The KCIA is watching you now. (Kerbal Central Intelligence Agency)
Yay! Jeb can look at Eve endermen now!
updated with new themed part.
